dataset_id.description: Identifier of this model's main dataset

dataset_ids.description: Identifiers of this model's additional datasets

fields_maps.description:
List of two-element arrays, where the first is a
                     dataset ID and the second is a field map; to be used
                     with dataset_ids

row_ranges.description: Rows used to build this model, per dataset.

samples.description:
A list of sample specifications, as pairs of
                     dataset id and sample

missing_tokens.description: Default tokens that represent a missing value

fields.description:
Possibly partial list of descriptors for fields
                     used in the model

objective_field.description:
Objective field (target) identifier.  Gets added to
                     objective_fields.  Useful for models with a single
                     objective field.
